patthana17.31:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.31:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.31:3.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
